mapper.sql: id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, name, total_num, every_limit_num, level_id, effective_day, type, scope, stock
mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.name,a.total_num,a.every_limit_num,a.level_id,b.level_name,a.effective_day,a.type,a.scope, a.discount,a.discount_full_money,a.reduction_full_money,a.reduction_post_money from am_coupon a left join pm_member_level b on a.level_id = b.id where a.id = #{id};

select id,name from am_coupon where del_flag = 0
and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
